snippet.title: M.E.A.T. II Absolute Zero - Gameplay Teaser (2024)
snippet.description:
Check out the pre-early access progress demo for M.E.A.T. II Absolute Zero!

M.E.A.T. II Absolute Zero is a continuation of M.E.A.T. RPG. What both titles have in common is pixel art graphics, a specific atmosphere of old school productions and an original plot. However, they are divided by genre - Absolute Zero is not just any shooter!

The player, playing the role of Sir Culligan, known from the first RPG, will have the opportunity to take matters into his own hands and bring justice to all those who have so far gotten under his skin. Emotions related to such an explosive (sic!) gameplay will be additionally heated by a properly selected, original soundtrack and dubbing made by Slon and Skits Vicious from the Dutch band DOPE D.O.D.

M.E.A.T. II Absolute Zero will be available in both digital and physical versions - including PC, Play Station and Xbox consoles.

◾️ WWW 📲 https://meatrpg.com/ 
◾️ STEAM 📲 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2176710/MEAT_II_Absolute_Zero/
◾️ FACEBOOK 📲   / meatrpg  
◾️ INSTAGRAM 📲   / meat_rpg  
◾️ MARKETING & COOPERATION: karolina@meatrpg.com
